name: Super Coffee Shop Adventure: Barista's Journey
name_original: Super Coffee Shop Adventure: Barista's Journey
description:
Attention: The game is completelly in spanish.

Your friend Dalia has desappeared. Help Thide to rescue her in this platform puzzle game. Use them special ability to throw the uniform cap as a boomerang!

This project has been developed by David Fernández Cebrián and Sara Carrasco Lloria as their Final Degree Project for Fine Arts. Music by Pablo Pérez Trufero.
